CHAPTER.VERS: Jesuh Khrih nasem le sawltak ahi keimah Simon Peter in:Eite’ Pasian le Honpa ahi Jesuh Khrih a thumanna hangin kote’ upna zah mahin upna manpha a nei mite tungah lai ka hong khak hi.
Pasian le i Topa Jesuh na theihna uh hangin hehpihna le nopsakna thupha note tungah tampi tak hong tung tahen.
Ama minthanna le a hoihnate a neikhawm dingin a hong sampa i theihna hangin Pasian’ deih bangin biakna mantak i nuntak theih nadingin ama vangliatna in eite’ kisap na khempeuh a hong pia hi.

Amah in piak dingin a hong ciam a manpha mahmah nate hih bangzia-in hong pia a, hih ama hong piak nate hangin leitungah a om siatna a piangsak thei duhluatna le deihluatnate panin na suakta uh a, Pasian’ pianziate na nei uh hi.
Hih thu hangin na upna ban uhah gamtat hoihna na behlap unla, na gamtat hoihna uh thutheihna tawh na behlap un;
na thutheihna uh pumpi ki-uk zawhna tawh na behlap unla, na pumpi ki-uk zawhna uh thuak zawhna tawh na behlap un; na thuak zawhna uh Pasian’ deih bangin gamtatna tawh na behlap unla,
Pasian’ deih bangin na gamtatna uh sanggam ki-itna tawh na behlap un; na sanggam ki-itna uh itna thukpi tawh na behlapzawh nadingun na hanciam un.
Hih bang hoihnate a kicingin na neih uhleh i Topa Jesuh Khrih na theihna uhah thahatin kimanna na nei ding uh hi.
Ahi zongin hih bang hoihna a nei lo mite pen mittaw-in a gamla a mu thei lo mite hi a, a mawhna lui uh panin a siangkhin ahih lam uh zong a mangngilh ta ahi uh hi.
Tua ahih manin sanggamte aw, Pasian in note hong sapna le hong teelna-ah a kip taktak na hih nadingun hahkat mahmah un. Tua bangin hahkat le-uhcin na puk ngei kei ding uh hi.
Tua hileh eite’ Topa le Honpa Jesuh Khrih Uk tawntungna sungah nuamtakin na lut thei ding uh hi.
Tua ahih manin note in hih thute thei khinin, na theihsa uh thumanah kiptakin na omkhin uh ahi zongin a hong phawksakkikkik ka hi hi.
Ka nuntak laiteng hih thute ka hong phawksakkikkik ding thuhoih khat hi, ci-in ka ngaihsun hi.
I Topa Jesuh Khrih in teltakin hong genkhin ahih manin hih leitung pumpi ka nusiat baih nading thu ka thei hi.
Tua ahih manin ka sih khit ciangin hih thute na phawkkikkik theih nadingun ka hih theih zahin ka hanciam ding hi.

I Topa Jesuh Khrih a vangliatna le a hong paikik nading thute note kiangah kong gen uh ciangin mihingte’ phuahtawm tuanthute siksanin a hong gen hi loin, ka mit mahmah uh tawh ka muh uh a vangliatnate a hong gen ka hi uh hi.

Vanglian Minthang pa in, “Hih pen ka it ka Tapa hi a, ama tungah ka lung a kim mahmah hi,” ci-in genin, Pa Pasian in ama tungah minthanna vang le pahtawina a piak laitakin komau pumpi mahmah tawh a om ka hi uh hi.
Mual siangtho tungah amah tawh ka omkhawm laitakun vantung panin hong ging awte komau mahmah in ka za uh hi.

Tua ahih manin kamsangte’ gen thute a man taktak ahihna thu ka teltheih uh hi. Note’ lungsimah Zingsol hong suakin khua a hong vak matengin khuamial lak a mei taang bangin hih thute ngaihsun le-uhcin hoih mahmah ding hi.
Na phawk ding uh a thupi mahmah khat in: Lai Siangtho sunga om thugen kholhnate, kuamah in ama pilna tawh a khiatna gen thei lo hi.
Bang hang hiam cih leh mihingte in a deih manin mailam thugenkholh theihna a kingah hi lo a, Kha Siangtho’ sawlna tawh Pasian’ kiang panin a hong pai thute a kigen ahi zaw hi.

Mite lakah kamsang man lo a omngei mah bangin note lakah sia man lo hong om ding hi. Siatna a piangsak thei thuhilhna a man lo hong lutpih simin, amaute mahmah a tan khia Topa nangawn nial ding uh hi. Tua ahih manin thakhat thu-in siatna thuaklawh ding uh hi.
Tua bang hinapi-in mi tampi tak in amau’ gamtat hoih lohna zui ding uh a, tua bangin amau gamtatna hangin mite in thuman lampi gensia ding uh hi.

Hih sia man lote in a huaiham manun note kiang panin sum a ngah theih nadingun phuahtawm thu hong gen ding uh hi. Ahi zongin sawtpek a kipanin amaute’ thu a Khen ding pa a kigingsa-in om niloh a, amaute a Susia ding pa in en gige hi.
Bang hang hiam cih leh vantung mite nangawn in khialhna a neih ciangin Pasian in khahkhong loin hell khuk sungah khia a, Thukhen Ni hun dong ngakin khuamial sungah kol bulhsa-in a omsak hi.
Pasian in tanglai mite khahkhong loin amah a um lo mite, tuiciin tumsak a, thuman thutak a hilh Noah le adang mi sagih bek suaktasak hi.
Pasian in Sodom le Gomorrah khuapite tungah thu khenin mei tawh haltum a, Pasian a um lo mite’ thuak nading limin a bawl hi.
Ngeina bangin a gamta lo mite in Lot a lungkhamsakna panun Pasian in mihoih Lot a hon khia hi.
Tua mihoih pa, amaute lakah teeng a, nisimin amaute’ gamtat hoih lohnate za-in mu tawntung ahih manin lunggim mahmah hi.
Tua ahih manin Topa in tua bang mihoihte a gimna uh panin suakta sakin, tua bang migilote Thukhen Ni hun dongin gimna pia-in a koihcip theih nading siamna a nei hi.
Pasian’ thu nialin amau pumpi deihna zui-in a gamta mite gim pia phadiak hi.Hih sia man lote kiphasakin hangsan mahmah uh a, minthanna a nei vantung a omte zahtak hetloin gensia ngam uh hi.
Hih sia man lote sangin hat zaw-in a vanglian zaw vantung mite nangawn in Topa’ mai-ah minthanna a nei vantung mite gensia ngam lo, mawhsak ngam lo uh hi.
Ahi zongin mat ding le thah dingin a piang gamlak ganhing gilote bangin a pianpih lungsim uh zui-in gamta uh a, a theih loh uh thute a gensia uh hi. Tua ganhingte mah bangin amaute kisusia dinga,

mite a gimsak mah bangun amaute tungah gimna kipia ding hi. A ut bangbangun suntangpi-in gamtat ding nuam a sa uh hi. Tua bang mite in note tawh ankuang hong umkhawmin, a zuau gamtatnate uhah nuamsa-in a om uh pen amaute adingin a zumhuai mahmah ahi hi.
Numei bekbek etnopin nei uh a, a mawhnopna lungsim uh kam thei lo hi. Upna cingtaak lo mite zol belin nei uh a, huaihamna lungsim bekbek a nei uh hi. Tua bang mite, Pasian’ samsiat mite ahi uh hi.
Thuman lampi nusia-in gammang uh a, a man loin gamtatna tawh sum a ngah nuam Beor’ tapa Balaam’ gamtat bangin gamta uh hi.
Balaam in ama mawhna hangin taiina a thuak hi. A pau thei lo la, mihing bangin hong pau a, kamsang Balaam’ haitatna a khawlsak hi.
Hih bang mite pen a kangcip khinsa ciktui, huih in a mutkhiat meiipi tawh kibang uh a, Pasian in amaute’ om nadingin khuamial sahpi omna mun a koih kholhsak hi.
Amaute kiphasakin haipau uh a, a khial gamtat mite sung panin a suakta khin liailiai zo mite, leitung pumpi deih bangin a gamtat nadingun a zol uh hi.
Amaute pen siatna a piangsak thei zongsatna lelin sila hinapi-un mite tungah suahtak nading thu a gen uh hi. Bang hang hiam cih leh mite pen, a hong zo peuhpeuhte’ sila ihi hi.
I Topa le Honpa Jesuh Khrih theihna hangin leitung siatna sung panin suakta khin napi-un, leitung siatna-ah awkkikin a lelte pen, a masa a pianzia uh sangin a nunung a pianzia uh siahuai zaw hi.
Tua bang mite in amaute tungah a kipia thu siangthote thei-in a nusiatkik sangun thuman lampi a thei ngei het lo uh hileh amau adingin hoih zaw thampek ding hi.
Paunak-ah, “Ui in a luak nekik hi,” a cihna le, “Vok a kisilsiang khit ciangin buannawng lak mahah bualkik veve hi,” a kicihna thu, amaute tungah a piang ahi hi.
Ka itte aw, hih ka hong laigelh a nihveina hi a, lungsim siangtak tawh thu na ngaihsut phatkik theih nadingun a nihvei mahin ka hong phawksakkik hi.
Tanglai peka kamsang siangthote’ thugen kholhte le note lakah sawltak na a semte in Topa le Honpa’ thupiakte a hong gensawn uh thute na phawkkik ding uh ka deih hi.
A masa penin na theih ding uh panin: Hun nunung lam ciangin amau pumpi deihna zui-in a gamta mi pawlkhat hong om dinga, amaute in note hong zahpih bawlin,
“Amah a hong paikik nading a thuciamna a bangci ahi hiam? I pu i pate zong si khinta uh a, leitung piancil a kipanin tu dong na khempeuh a kibang mahin omom lai hi,” hong ci ding uh hi.
Amaute in a kitheihmawh bawl uh thu pen: Tanglai pekin Pasian in ama kampauna tawh vantung le leitung na piangsak hi. Tui sung panin tui mah tawh leitung na piangsak a,
tui tawh a piansak leitung pen tui mah tawh na susia leuleu hi.
Tu-in tua Pasian’ kampauna mah tawh, mei tawh haltum dingin tu-in a om vantung le leitung a kikoihcing hi a, Pasian a um lo mite thu kikhenin a kisuksiat hun ding bek ngakin a om ahi uh hi.
Ahi zongin ka itte aw, na mangngilh loh ding uh ka deih thu in: Topa adingin ni khat le kum khat, kum tulkhat le ni khat a kilamdan luatna om lo hi.

Mi pawlkhatte’ ngaihsut bangin Topa in a kamciamna a hong tungsak hak hi zenzen lo hi. Note khat beek in siatna na thuakkhak ding uh deih loin na vekpi-un na kisik ding uh deih ahih manin hong pai nai lohna pen note hong khualna hizaw hi.

Ahi zongin theih kholh lohpi-in guta bangin Topa hong pai ding Ni hong tung ding hi. Tua Ni ciangin nakpitakin a ging in vantungte mai mang sakin, vantung nate mei in kangtumin mai mang dinga, leitung le a tunga om na khempeuh a mangthang ding hi.
Hih nate khempeuh hih bangin kisusia mangkhin ding ahih manin note a bangci mi dingin kilawm cih limtakin na ngaihsun un. A siangtho nuntakna nei-in Pasian’ deihna bangin na gamta unla,
vantungte mei in kangtumin, vantung nate sa lua-in a tui mang ding hun Pasian’ Ni hong tunbaih theih nadingin na hih theih zahun hanciam unla, na ngak un.
Eite in Pasian’ hong ciamsa, thuman bekbek a kizat nading mun van thak le lei thak a ngak ihi hi.
Tua ahih ciangin ka itte aw, hih Ni ding ngakin na om laitakun Pasian’ muhna-ah paubaanna om hetloin amah tawh nuamtakin na omkhawm theih nadingun hanciam un.

I sanggam Paul in Pasian’ piak pilna zangin note kiangah lai a hong gelhnate sungah a gen mah bangin note khempeuh in hotkhiatna na ngah theih nading uh hun hong piakna-in Topa hong zekai ahihna thu na phawk un.

Lai a hong gelhna sungah a thugente tu-ate mah a gen nuam ahi hi. A laigelhna sungah a telhak thu tampi om a, theihna kicing loin lungsim kip lo mi pawlkhatte in Lai Siangtho sung thu a ututun a kawihei uh bangin Paul’ thugente zong a man lopi-in khia uh ahih manin siatna a tuaklawh uh hi.
Tua ahih ciangin ka itte aw, hih thute thei khol unla, ngeina man zui lo mite’ khemna zui kha-in na bulkip panun na pukkhak loh nadingun na kidawm un.
Hehpihna thu le i Topa le Honpa Jesuh Khrih theihna thu-ah na khangto semsem zaw un. Tuhun a kipanin a tawntungin amah in minthanna ngah paisuak tahen. Amen.
